title: Pixel 3xl experiencing sudden battery drain. Usually around 15% drains and shuts off in seconds.
content: Tried factory reset, safe mode, opt in and opt out of Android 10 beta. Appears to only be a problem when draining from 100%. After charging from 0 to 10 or 15, it's not a problem. This is exactly like the Nexus problem.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
